attributes.action: scrap "nice" and replace it with a UK body that approves new drugs for the whole state. universally
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Regardless of where you live. Scotland, England, Wales or Northern Ireland. The patient should be granted clinical treatment of an equal parity. If a treatment is approved in one country it should be ratified in ALL the others!

rejection.details: Healthcare is devolved outside of England and this is therefore a matter for the Devolved Administrations.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
